name: Pintarnya
description: Pintarnya uses a data driven approach to allow job seekers to search and apply for jobs based on their interests, location, skill sets or education. Our new Cari Cuan feature also enables users to gain additional income while waiting for their applications; users can complete missions and receive rewarding incentives via Pintarnya e-wallet.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Smart recruitment solution to find best Talents
ShortDescription: Pintarnya, a technology startup headquartered in Indonesia, is dedicated to providing job opportunities and access for Indonesian job seekers to generate additional income.

Highlights.name: Focus on Part-time and Additional Income
Highlights.description: There strong focus on helping people find part-time jobs, freelance work, or other ways to earn extra money.

Highlights.name: Easy Application Process
Highlights.description: The website and app are designed for ease of use, allowing people to quickly browse and apply for jobs.

Highlights.name: Understanding Local Market
Highlights.description: By focusing on the Indonesian language and job market, Pintarnya demonstrates an understanding of the local needs and preferences for finding and offering additional income opportunities.

enhanced_description: Pintarnya is an Indonesian technology startup providing a smart, data-driven recruitment solution focused on connecting job seekers with opportunities and helping companies hire top talent faster. The platform enables job seekers to search and apply for jobs based on their interests, location, skill sets, and education. A unique feature, 'Cari Cuan,' allows users to generate additional income by completing missions and receiving incentives via the Pintarnya e-wallet while waiting for job applications. The platform emphasizes an easy application process and has a strong understanding of the local Indonesian job market, with a particular focus on part-time jobs, freelance work, and additional income opportunities.
key_use_cases: Job search and application for job seekers
Generating additional income through in-app missions (Cari Cuan feature)
Finding part-time and freelance work opportunities
Rapid browsing and application for jobs
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Unique 'Cari Cuan' feature for users to earn income via e-wallet while job searching
Strong focus on part-time, freelance, and additional income opportunities
Deep understanding and focus on the local Indonesian job market
roi_benefits: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Opportunity for job seekers to gain additional income/incentives
